name: deafeningly

in an extremely loud way: The radio was deafeningly loud. The shotgun roared deafeningly in the echoing space of the large hall. deafeningly silent
If you are deafeningly silent, you do not respond, or you stay silent when people expect you to speak or act: In these professional areas, the reports are deafeningly silent.
